testprocedure.test-case-summary: This test procedure is called by a test case and is used to verify the SUTs support of the dlDeviceInformationSubscription dialog as an OC using variables provided by the calling test case. This procedure supports verification of requirements related to user need 2.3.5.10.10 [Need to Share Turning Movement and Intersection Data] and is used for both valid and invalid test cases.

testStep.functionId: Step 1 CONFIGURE: Determine the Application Layer Standard that will be used for this test. RECORD this information as: ApplicationLayerStandard: ${ApplicationLayerStandard}

Step 2 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Publish Signal Inventory Information (NTRM 3.3.5.11.1.2}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N95R968_Publish_Signal_Inventory_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N95R968_Publish_Signal_Inventory_Information_Parameter}

Step 3 CONFIGURE: Determine the dialog performance requirement for Subscribe to Signal Inventory Information (NTRM 3.3.5.11.1.3}. RECORD this value as: TMDD_N95R969_Subscribe_to_Signal_Inventory_Information_Parameter = ${TMDD_N95R969_Subscribe_to_Signal_Inventory_Information_Parameter}

Step 4 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Error Report is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.1.4.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported}

Step 5 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Restrictions - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.1). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 6 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R381_Device_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R381_Device_Description_Supported}

Step 7 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Control Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported}

Step 8 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Roadway Network Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 9 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifier - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 10 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Linear Reference - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 11 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Route Designator - Device Inventory is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported}

Step 12 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Uniform Resource Locator (URL) (DeviceURL) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported = ${TMDD_N95R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported}

Step 13 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device URL Reference Medium is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported}

Step 14 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Device Inventory Date and Time Change Information is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.1.2.1.2.16). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported}

Step 15 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Link Identifiers is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.2). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R974_Link_Identifiers_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R974_Link_Identifiers_Supported}

Step 16 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Direction of Traffic is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.3). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R975_Direction_of_Traffic_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R975_Direction_of_Traffic_Supported}

Step 17 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Movement Identifier (MovementIdentifier) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.4). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R976_Movement_Identifier__MovementIdentifier__Supported = ${TMDD_N95R976_Movement_Identifier__MovementIdentifier__Supported}

Step 18 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Vehicle Movement Approach Link is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.5). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R977_Vehicle_Movement_Approach_Link_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R977_Vehicle_Movement_Approach_Link_Supported}

Step 19 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Pedestrian Movement Approach Link is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.6). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R978_Pedestrian_Movement_Approach_Link_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R978_Pedestrian_Movement_Approach_Link_Supported}

Step 20 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Departing Link is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.7). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R979_Departing_Link_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R979_Departing_Link_Supported}

Step 21 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Crossing Point is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.8). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R980_Crossing_Point_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R980_Crossing_Point_Supported}

Step 22 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Turning Movement Approach Vector is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.9). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R981_Turning_Movement_Approach_Vector_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R981_Turning_Movement_Approach_Vector_Supported}

Step 23 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Turning Movement Type is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.10). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R982_Turning_Movement_Type_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R982_Turning_Movement_Type_Supported}

Step 24 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Turning Movement Lanes is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.11). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R983_Turning_Movement_Lanes_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R983_Turning_Movement_Lanes_Supported}

Step 25 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Turning Movement Description is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.12). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R984_Turning_Movement_Description_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R984_Turning_Movement_Description_Supported}

Step 26 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Phase Identifier (PhaseIdentifier) is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.13). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R985_Phase_Identifier__PhaseIdentifier__Supported = ${TMDD_N95R985_Phase_Identifier__PhaseIdentifier__Supported}

Step 27 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Coordinated Phase is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.14). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R986_Coordinated_Phase_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R986_Coordinated_Phase_Supported}

Step 28 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Concurrent Phases is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.15). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R987_Concurrent_Phases_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R987_Concurrent_Phases_Supported}

Step 29 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Overlap Phase is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.17). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R989_Overlap_Phase_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R989_Overlap_Phase_Supported}

Step 30 CONFIGURE: Determine whether Overlap Included Phases is required by the specification. (NRTM 3.3.5.11.1.5.2.18). RECORD this information as: TMDD_N95R990_Overlap_Included_Phases_Supported = ${TMDD_N95R990_Overlap_Included_Phases_Supported}
Step 31 CONFIGURE: Determine the number of publication message transmissions that will be received within this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationsToReceive: ${PublicationsToReceive}
Step 32 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorResponseExpected: ${PublicationErrorResponseExpected}

Step 33 CONFIGURE: IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: PublicationErrorTypeExpected: ${PublicationErrorTypeExpected}
Step 34 CONFIGURE: Define the publication response message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: PublicationResponseMessage: ${PublicationResponseMessage}
Step 35 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the Authentication parameters need to be verified within this test. RECORD this information as: AuthenticationCheck: ${AuthenticationCheck}
Step 36 CONFIGURE: Determine whether the SUT will be allowed access to the information requested in this test. RECORD this information as: AllowAccess: ${AllowAccess}
Step 37 CONFIGURE: Define the subscription message that will be sent to the SUT. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionMessage: ${SubscriptionMessage}
Step 38 CONFIGURE: Determine whether an error response message is expected for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected}

Step 39 CONFIGURE: IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is true, determine the expected error code response for this test. RECORD this information as: SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected: ${SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected}

Step 40 SUBSCRIPTION-EC with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlDeviceInformationSubscription RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED= SUBSCRIPTIONMESSAGE = SubscriptionMessage SUBSCRIPTIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected SUBSCRIPTIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = SubscriptionErrorTypeExpected Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 41 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 41.1 WHILE CONTINUEPUBLICATION is equal to TRUE then CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note:If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.

Step 41.1.1 PUBLICATION-EC-RECEIVE with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlIntersectionSignalInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N95R968_Publish_Signal_Inventory_Information_Parameter PUBLICATIONSTORECEIVE = PublicationsToReceive PUBLICATIONERRORRESPONSEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorResponseExpected PUBLICATIONERRORTYPEEXPECTED = PublicationErrorTypeExpected AUTHENTICATIONCHECK = AuthenticationCheck ALLOWACCESS = AllowAccess Returns: CONTINUEPUBLICATION

Step 41.1.2 IF PublicationErrorResponseExpected is not equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. Note: If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 41.1.2.1 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.3 VERIFY that a device-id data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.4 VERIFY that a device-location data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.5 VERIFY that a device-name data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.6 VERIFY that an intersectionSignalInventoryMsg message was received.
Step 41.1.2.7 VERIFY that a device-inventory-header data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.8 VERIFY that an intersection-name data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item
Step 41.1.2.9 IF TMDD_N95R380_Restrictions___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.9.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.10 IF TMDD_N95R381_Device_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.10.1 VERIFY that a device-description data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.11 IF TMDD_N95R382_Device_Control_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.11.1 VERIFY that a device-control-type data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.12 IF TMDD_N95R384_Roadway_Network_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.12.1 VERIFY that a network-id data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.13 IF TMDD_N95R387_Link_Identifier___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.13.1 VERIFY that a link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.14 IF TMDD_N95R390_Linear_Reference___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.14.1 VERIFY that a linear-reference data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.15 IF TMDD_N95R392_Route_Designator___Device_Inventory_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.15.1 VERIFY that a route-designator data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.16 IF TMDD_N95R393_Device_Uniform_Resource_Locator__URL___DeviceURL__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.16.1 VERIFY that a device-url data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.17 IF TMDD_N95R394_Device_URL_Reference_Medium_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.17.1 VERIFY that an url-reference-medium data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header.device-url
Step 41.1.2.18 IF TMDD_N95R395_Device_Inventory_Date_and_Time_Change_Information_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.18.1 VERIFY that a last-update-time data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.device-inventory-header
Step 41.1.2.19 IF TMDD_N95R974_Link_Identifiers_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.19.1 VERIFY that a link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.intersection-link-list.link
Step 41.1.2.20 IF TMDD_N95R975_Direction_of_Traffic_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.20.1 VERIFY that a link-direction data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.intersection-link-list.link
Step 41.1.2.21 IF TMDD_N95R976_Movement_Identifier__MovementIdentifier__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.21.1 VERIFY that a movement-identifier data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.movement-list.intersection-movements
Step 41.1.2.22 IF TMDD_N95R977_Vehicle_Movement_Approach_Link_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.22.1 VERIFY that an approach-link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.movement-list.intersection-movements
Step 41.1.2.23 IF TMDD_N95R978_Pedestrian_Movement_Approach_Link_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.23.1 VERIFY that an approach-link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.movement-list.intersection-movements
Step 41.1.2.24 IF TMDD_N95R979_Departing_Link_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.24.1 VERIFY that a departing-link-id data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.movement-list.intersection-movements
Step 41.1.2.25 IF TMDD_N95R980_Crossing_Point_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.25.1 VERIFY that a crossing-point data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.movement-list.intersection-movements
Step 41.1.2.26 IF TMDD_N95R981_Turning_Movement_Approach_Vector_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.26.1 VERIFY that an approach-vector data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.movement-list.intersection-movements
Step 41.1.2.27 IF TMDD_N95R982_Turning_Movement_Type_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.27.1 VERIFY that a turning-movement-code data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.movement-list.intersection-movements
Step 41.1.2.28 IF TMDD_N95R983_Turning_Movement_Lanes_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.28.1 VERIFY that a turning-movement-lanes data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.movement-list.intersection-movements
Step 41.1.2.29 IF TMDD_N95R984_Turning_Movement_Description_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.29.1 VERIFY that a turning-movement-text data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.movement-list.intersection-movements
Step 41.1.2.30 IF TMDD_N95R985_Phase_Identifier__PhaseIdentifier__Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.30.1 VERIFY that a phase-identifier data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.phase-list.phases
Step 41.1.2.31 IF TMDD_N95R986_Coordinated_Phase_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.31.1 VERIFY that a coordinated-phase data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.phase-list.phases
Step 41.1.2.32 IF TMDD_N95R987_Concurrent_Phases_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 41.1.2.32.1 VERIFY that a concurrent-phases-list data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.phase-list.phases
Step 41.1.2.33 IF TMDD_N95R989_Overlap_Phase_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.33.1 VERIFY that an overlap-identifier data element exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.overlap-phase-list.overlap-phases
Step 41.1.2.34 IF TMDD_N95R990_Overlap_Included_Phases_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.

Step 41.1.2.34.1 VERIFY that an overlap-included-phases data frame exists within each instance of data frame intersectionSignalInventoryMsg.intersection-signal-inventory-item.overlap-phase-list.overlap-phases
Step 41.1.2.35 VERIFY that the values within the REQUEST message are correct per the TMDD standard and known operational conditions.

USER-VERIFY-MESSAGE.functionId: The User Verifies the message content

testStep.functionId: Step 41.1.2.36 CONFIGURE: Set CONTENTVERIFIED to True

Step 41.1.2.37 POSTCONDITION: PUBLICATION-EC-REPLY with the following parameters: DIALOG=dlIntersectionSignalInventoryUpdate RESPONSETIMEREQUIRED=TMDD_N95R968_Publish_Signal_Inventory_Information_Parameter CONTENTVERIFIED = CONTENTVERIFIED PUBLICATIONRESPONSEMESSAGE = PublicationResponseMessage

Step 42 IF SubscriptionErrorResponseExpected is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE, OTHERWISE skip the following substeps. If a verification step fails, then test execution will proceed at the next subsequent Post Condition step, if present. Otherwise, test execution will proceed to the final Exit step.
Step 42.1 VERIFY that an errorReportMsg message was received.
Step 42.2 VERIFY that an organization-information data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 42.3 VERIFY that an organization-requesting data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 42.4 VERIFY that an error-code data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 42.5 VERIFY that an error-text data element exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 42.6 VERIFY that data element error-code is set to SubscriptionErrorResponseTypeExpected.
Step 42.7 IF TMDD_N95R15_Restrictions___Error_Report_Supported is equal to TRUE THEN CONTINUE; OTHERWISE skip the following substeps.
Step 42.7.1 VERIFY that a restrictions data frame exists within message errorReportMsg.
Step 43 EXIT
